thread.title: BRIEF-Sports Direct Says It Holds 8.9% Stake In Iconix Brand Group, 19.3% Stake In Finish Line

title: BRIEF-Sports Direct Says It Holds 8.9% Stake In Iconix Brand Group, 19.3% Stake In Finish Line
text:
April 30, 2018 / 6:49 AM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-Sports Direct Says It Holds 8.9% Stake In Iconix Brand Group, 19.3% Stake In Finish Line Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Sports Direct International PLC :
* NOW HOLDS FOLLOWING ECONOMIC INTERESTS IN US STRATEGIC INVESTMENTS
* 5,664,115 SHARES IN ICONIX BRAND GROUP INC, REPRESENTING 8.9% OF ISSUED COMMON STOCK
* 7,957,800 SHARES IN FINISH LINE INC, REPRESENTING 19.3% OF ISSUED COMMON STOCK OF THAT COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
